name: Ambition of the New World
description: In this text-based, choose your own adventure, the player awakens in a new, artificial body as the only survivor in an explosion in a residential center of the spaceship Ambition . Ambition is bound for a habitable planet named New Terra, carrying Humans and AIs. The player is caught in between two worlds, partially Human and partially AI, forced to chose sides in a budding war. Choosing from three different endings, the player is faced with secrets and deception while searching for answers and advice on which side to take.
